r.s: Create and Use PHP Archive files
r.d: PHP_Archive allows you to create a single .phar file containing an entire application.
r.n: major bugfix release * fix 64-bit/32-bit compatibility of phars (Brian Shire) * fix Bug #11858: seek to SEEK_END fails * fix Bug #11859: mapPhar fails for all phars internally loaded * fix Bug #11860: missing constant in PHP_Archive_Exception UNKNOWNSIG
